name: Flinders St. Hostel - International Female Only
nameEN: Flinders St. Hostel - International Female Only
description:
Townsville's first Female Only International Backpacker Hostel situated in the heart of the nightlife precinct. We are the perfect choice for female backpackers eager to experience the city's vibrant scene. Within walking distance are bars, restaurants and cafes. We are also conveniently located near the SeaLink Ferry Terminal and bus depot. Freshly renovated, our stylish air-conditioned rooms and communal areas offer top-notch comfort including Wi-Fi, lockers and laundry facilities. Committed to exceptional hospitality, we create a social atmosphere that makes your stay—whether for a night or a week—an unforgettable experience.

At Flinders St. Hostel we practice self check-in. This means you can get to the Hostel at the time you want and access it without having to wait in long lines at a reception. The secret? Self check-in will allow you to complete the registration of your reservation and will deliver you your own personal 4 digit pin code in the blink of an eye! The process is very simple: once your online booking is confirmed by our staff, you will receive your confirmation booking and access code via email. 

Need Help?
No problem! Please contact us via email or the phone number provided on your booking confirmation. We will help you in everything you need: from completing the registration of the reservation with you or recommending the best bars in the city. We are available 24/7 to meet all your needs and make your stay much easier and more bearable.

Book now to discover the best of Townsville and Magnetic Island.

houseRules.notes:
FEMALE ONLY -  International Hostel.

*All bookings at Flinders St. Hostel are Non Refundable and are subject to full payment immediately*

TO BE ABLE TO COMPLETE YOUR RESERVATION, PLEASE EMAIL THROUGH TO US A COPY OF YOUR CURRENT INTERNATIONAL PASSPORT AND PHONE NUMBER.

A legitimate email address is required to confirm all bookings. Bookings containing a hidden email address will be cancelled. 
Requests to transfer reservations is not available.

Check-In -
Please note – we practice a SELF CHECK-IN. On arrival at our 2pm check-in time please
use your provided secure pin code to gain access. The code provided will give you access
to the Entry Door on ground level, then entry to the Hostel on Level 2 which is located on
Level 2 and your assigned room. This 4-digit pin code will permanently be deactivated at
checkout time of 10am on your check out day. Failure you checkout on time will incur a
penalty fee.

Bookings –
● At the time of booking the customer must provide a valid credit card for payment in
full. A surcharge of 2.5% for Visa/Mastercard and 2.5% for AMEX applies to all
charges. These charges will be automatically processed at time of booking and are
non – refundable. Cash and EFTPOS will not be accepted in lieu of a credit card.
● A current international passport is required for all accommodation bookings.
● Management reserves the right to amend or alter prices or terms and conditions at
any time without notice.
● No request for a booking should be deemed as accepted until the hostel confirms
this acceptance once the required passport is received, and a booking confirmation is issued.
● When booking multiple beds please note we have multiple rooms of the same type.
We are unable to guarantee you will be located in the same room.
● Flinders St. Hostel reserves the right to refuse or decline your booking at any time
without cause or reason.
● Your credit card will be held as security for your reservation and utilised for any
applicable fees and charges arising from these terms and conditions. Unless an
alternative valid card is provided this card may be used for any loss or damages
caused during the stay.

Prices –
Prices are seasonal and subject to change without notice.

Age Policy -
All guests must be 18 years or older to stay at Flinders St. Hostel.

CCTV-
Please be advised that CCTV is always active within the Hostel. This does not include
shared bathroom amenities or bedrooms.

WIFI-
We offer complimentary WIFI for our guests’ enjoyment. Should there be any interruption to
this service there will be no compensation for this free service.

ANTI-SOCIAL BEHAVIOUR –
At the discretion of Flinders St. Hostel management, guests may be asked to vacate if they
are deemed to be behaving in a socially unacceptable way, causing damage, disturbing
other guests, using unacceptable language or otherwise breaking our rules. No refund will
be given in the event of eviction and a fine will apply.

● Guests will be held responsible for any loss or damages caused at the hostel.
Guests may be liable for any repairs, cleaning, or replacing any property of the
hostel that is damaged, soiled, stolen or lost. Guests will be liable for any
unapproved visitors and will be fined.
● Tampering with any fire protection equipment or CCTV device at the hostel is strictly
prohibited and will result in fines and or damages.
● Unless an actual fire emergency has occurred guests responsible for activation of
fire alarms will be held accountable for fines and charges issued by QLD Fire.
● Flinders St. Hostel will not be held responsible for, or liable to compensate loss, theft
or damage to personal property on or brought into the accommodation or in the
immediate vicinity of the accommodation.
● Usage of storage lockers and luggage rooms is at the owner's own risk. BYO lock.
● Strictly no visitors are permitted at this hostel.
● We ask that you respect other guests by limiting the amount of noise in the hostel
after 10pm.

OTHER GENERAL CONDITIONS AND HOUSE RULES -
● Smoking and Vaping are strictly prohibited in all areas of the hostel.
● Customers must not consume or store food or beverages in dorm rooms.
● Unapproved visitors are prohibited and will result in an unapproved guest charge
and or instant eviction.
● Kitchen area is available 24 hours to all guests. Failure to clean up after use will
result in a cleaning fee.
● Balcony area is available to all guests from 7am each day until 10pm nightly.
● No clothing or washing garments are to be stored in common areas or balconies.
● Flinders St. Hostel does not have suitable wheelchair access.
● Pets are not allowed in the hostel. This excludes service dogs.
● Upon check out all guests are to remove linen from their bed and leave for inventory check.  Any items missing guests will receive a linen fee charge.
